post:
HTTP Zoom (www.httpzoom.com) is a brand owned by HTTP Simple (www.httpsimple.com) geared towards the lowend market.

We have, for several years, provided premium quality hosting, VPS and dedicated services. Our aim is to now bring that same level of quality and customer support into the Lowend Market place.

**How are we different from the rest?**
1) We have a long track record in making our customers happy
2) We already have existing infrastructure being used from our parent company, who have been successful since 2007.

**Special Offer**

15% off all Xen 15k SAS Packages: Code 15off

VM15 - A - UK

Price £24 / Year (£20.40 with coupon)
128MB Dedicated Ram
256MB Swap
5GB Diskspace
100GB Transfer
